turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to place an order for three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will like to order from Belle Vina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what toppings did you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one pizza to have peperoni, I would like another pizza to be a Hawaiian, and I would like the last pizza to be meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so you are ordering 3 small pizzas, 1 pepperoni, one Hawaiian, and one meat lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I have special instructions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what are those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make all three pizzas thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, that won't affect the price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, that is all I need.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please deliver?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, please note that the total doesn't include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be delivered in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
